title: Law enforcement needs to go further and faster to counter deadly threat from organised crime
text:
Serious and organised crime isn’t easy to spot.

The perpetrators conduct their activities under a cloak of secrecy.

They exploit the anonymity of the dark recesses of the internet to avoid detection, and use intimidation and the threat of violence to keep their victims silent.

The upshot is that most of us are unaware of this type of offending as we go about our lives.

But we should be in no doubt: serious and organised crime is happening every day in towns and cities all over the country, and it affects us all.

It is one of the deadliest and most corrosive threats we face as a society.

So I am today launching this review to ensure we are bringing all our powers to bear against these ruthless...
